Why Choose Lone Star Financing?

Close on Time

Our goal is to close every loan in 28 days or less. In-house underwriting, processing, and closing for fast approval and on-time fundings.

Low Rates & Fees

San Antonio Lender with Low Mortgage Rates. FHA, VA, and USDA Approved Lender.

  • San Antonio Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees

San Antonio, TX Mortgage Lender

Buying a new home and looking for a San Antonio mortgage lender?  If you are seeking a mortgage or home loan, then you have come to the right place. With over 10 years of experience in our office, our seasoned mortgage professionals have the expertise to close loans fast. Our goal always is to close loans in less than 20 days in most lending scenarios. We are unmatched in closing costs, efficiency and truthfulness. With in-house underwriting we can make common sense decisions on loan approvals. If you are looking for a mortgage lender in San Antonio, we specialize in new home purchases, VA Home Loans and FHA Home Loans.

As a consummate mortgage lending professionals, our loan officers s are committed to providing excellent customer service throughout the entire loan process. As a leader in the mortgage technology field we have streamlined procedures supported by the mortgage lending industry’s best mortgage technology to make the entire mortgage lending process from application to close as stress free as possible. San Antonio moonlight has a lot of mortgage lenders, and we know you have a decision in your home loan shopping process. At Lone Star Financing we can provide a level of customer service and home loan options that most traditional mortgage brokers or even your bank can not make available. Competitive rates, personal attention, a variety of mortgage loan options and quick and easy pre-qualification approvals! As a San Antonio Mortgage Lender, we service own home loans and have the flexibility to underwrite to our independent guidelines. Call Russell Stout and his team today or apply online for a Free Good Faith Estimate.

  • San Antonio Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Local underwriting and closing for fast approval & funding
  • No-Obligation Good Faith Estimate


Lone Star Financing – Your Local Mortgage Lender for new home loans and mortgage refinancing. 

San Antonio Real Estate (2022)

The June, 2022 report from the San Antonio Board of REALTORS showed that the average cost of homes in the San Antonio area — now $345,114 — is 19.4% higher than this time last year, when it stood at $289,518.  The moonlight home market continues to stay hot even in a rising rates environment. That jump is significantly higher than the rise in average home prices from 2019 and 2020.  Some of the hotter neighborhoods in the San Antonio real estate market is Alamo Heights, Tobin Hill, Terrel Hills, King William and North Central.


This average home value is seasonally adjusted and only includes the middle price tier of homes.  There are currently 8941 homes for sale in San Antonio, TX at a median listing home price of $298,000. Search homes for sale in San Antonio at Realtor.com.
